name: Out of Croscombe
description:
The village won't let you go...

Out of Croscombe is a solo player tile game made with Unreal Engine 4. 

The player must get our character, Edward VonBorough, to the carriage that will allow him to escape from Croscombe.
This is done by placing tiles one after another; from the original tile to the carriage tile. The goal is to connect the different paths on the tiles and to lead Edward safely to the carriage, without him getting lost along the way, and before he collapses from exhaustion.

Victory condition: Reach the carriage.

Defeat conditions: Mental health is depleted OR the exhaustion rate is full OR the timer reaches 00:00.

A little pitch of the game: 

England, 1855.

Edward Von Borough, a big-city doctor, is trying to leave the small, spooky village of Croscombe, which is very uncomfortable for him... However, in order to do so, he will have to cross swampy groves, and take paths as haunted as they are winding, in order to reach the carriage that will allow him to leave the village.

Team members: 

Artists: BOSC Eva, CARTIL Mathieu, HUBERT Benoît, MOULIN Steven, SAINT-SORNY Brice, TOUSSAINT Nicolas.

Game Designers: CAUCHOIS Lilian, GARCIA Julien, LINUESA Lola, VAUDAINE Lucas (Lead Game Designer), VELIA Arnaud (Lead Game Developper).
